group_1.textLeft: Great!@Now, let's go get that Witch!

group_1.textRight: Witches are powerful beings.@Are you sure you're ready?

group_1.textLeft: ...Oh, but first I need to@get these people to safety.
It's gonna be all right.@I'm here to save you!

group_1.narration: It's been one week since@I first met a strange creature@called Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: I will grant you one wish.@Whatever you like.

group_1.narration: I couldn't believe it.@In fact, I was terrified.
I mean, a talking animal?@That's crazy!
And yet, somehow, it doesn't@seem so strange anymore.
Actually, Kyubey and I talk a lot now...
So I learned about these things@called Witches.

group_1.textRight: Countless people despair because of them.
Only Magical Girls can save them.

group_1.textLeft: You mean I could save people@like my dad does...?

group_1.narration: My dad works on a@special Rescue Squad.
He risks his life for others.@He's the coolest! I really respect him.
I had a favorite picture book when@I was young that my dad got me.
...about a [textRed:knight] who saves a@village from an evil dragon!
I've read it more times than I can count, and@I still carry it around with me, even now.
Why, you ask? Well,@at some point, I decided...

group_1.textLeft: I want to rescue and protect@people, just like dad...
Just like the knight@from my picture book!

group_1.narration: Something happened that@made me second guess myself...
